title: AE插件-时间百分比数字滚动动画 Digit Fiddler v1.3.2 Win版+使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 插件Digit Fiddler可以在AE中解决任何计数动画；无论是数字，货币，百分比还是时间（分钟，秒等）都可以给你提供帮助。1.3.2版本修复层偏移的错误。

AE插件-时间百分比数字滚动动画 Digit Fiddler v1.3.2 Win版百度网盘下载

other.plugin_introduction_en: Digit Fiddler is your complete solution for counting anything in After Effects using a single slider. Whether it’s currency, percentages or time (minutes, seconds, etc), Fiddler’s got you covered.
